text: etala manja te banne stri'o manthi eka temani tarapha sarama'ine avi, kaheva lagi ke mara pita tamane bolave che, jethi tame amara (dhoro)ne je pani pivadavyum che tenum valatara ape. Jyare musa a.Sa. Temani pase pahoncya ane temani same potani sampurna paristhitinum varnana karyum, to te kaheva lagya have daro nahim, tame atyacari komathi chutakaro melavyo
